result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Possess Firearm-Adjudicated Deliquent of a Felony

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jovonte O Larry

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jovonte O Larry appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Claire E Zyber in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status of counsel.  Defendant informs the Court he is now eligible for State Public Defender representation.  Case is adjourned to  11-8-22 at 1:30 pm for status of counsel by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jovonte O Larry appeared by video.  Attorney Claire E Zyber in court for State of Wisconsin. Case in court for prelim. Defendant does not have counsel for today's hearing and requests additional time to retain counsel. Court grants additional time to retain counsel. Court finds GOOD CAUSE TO EXTEND TIME LIMITS of prelim. Case adjourned in Branch 10.
Status conference scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and filed. Justice Point Supervision Report. Deputy Court Clerk: EAB.

Court ordered no contact with PSG (03/26/1997).
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jovonte O Larry in court with attorney Alejandro A Lockwood.  Defendant Jovonte O Larry in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jovonte O Larry appeared by video means with Attorney.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings. DEFENDANT IS NOT INDIGENT.    
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
